detail_desc: Biker jacket in grained imitation leather with a zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in crushed velvet with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, no buttons and a double back vent. Lined.

Calf-length satin dress in a narrow cut at the top with a small stand-up collar, concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and an opening at the top front and back. Elasticated seam at the waist and a pleated skirt. Lined.
Fitted top in sturdy jersey with a round neckline and short, voluminous, double-layered puff sleeves in crinkled organza with concealed elastication at the hems.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and front pockets.
High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Glittery dressing up shoes in imitation leather with a strap across the foot with a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and press-stud and detachable belt. Pleats at the front, side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit wool with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, superstretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist, chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a zip in one side.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fabric trainers with a concealed elastic gore at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide panel to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.

Pyjamas with a pair of bottoms and a long-sleeved nursing top in soft jersey. Top with long sleeves, a wrapover, lace-covered V-neck and a gathered seam under the bust. Bottoms with wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy and straight legs with lace trims at the hems. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 10 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neck and dolman sleeves. Unlined.
Longer cardigan in an airy, pattern knit. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. No fasteners.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, ribbed neckline.

Two-button jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a fake pocket at the top, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Leggings in stretch fabric. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases at the front and raw-edge hems.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and decorative pleats at the front. Double yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with beaded embroidery at the top and gathered seams at the sides for a more comfortable fit.
V-neck playsuit in soft jersey with lace details, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, a seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in jersey made from a cotton blend with a zip at the back, side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats.
Set with one hair clip, two hair grips and a pair of earrings in metal decorated with plastic beads. Length of earrings approx. 4 cm, length of hair clip 6 cm, length of hair grips approx. 8.5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Wide headband in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective details. Width 9 cm. The headband is made partly from recycled polyester.
Trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Lightly padded puffer jacket in a quilted weave. Detachable hood with concealed press-studs and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Discreet pockets in the side seams and narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.
Bell-shaped skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
A-line dress in a viscose weave with a round neck and concealed buttons down the front. Long balloon sleeves with a seam at the top and elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Joggers in soft, patterned jersey with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a motif and appliqué on the front. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Large leather shopper with two handles at the top and decorative seams front and back. Size 14x32x39 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with inset lace trims at the front and butterfly sleeves in woven fabric with broderie anglaise.

Dance dress in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Seam at the waist with a glittery elastic waistband and a skirt in layers of glittery tulle. Lined gusset.
Tube scarf in an airy weave.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with reflective details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif. Raw edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable imitation leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap 1.2 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.8 cm.
Longer, straight-cut jacket in a stretch weave with narrow lapels and no fasteners. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy weave with a detachable, pile-lined hood with imitation-leather details. Stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a wind flap and press-studs. Chest pocket, two flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Calf-length kaftan dress in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, cap sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Hoodie in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a terry motif on the front, an extra-wide neckline, jersey-lined hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sandals with hook and loop fastenings. Moulded, imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.
Trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long, V-neck satin dress with short cap sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a straight skirt with a high slit at the front. Lined.
Loose-fitting shirt in woven fabric with a collar, dropped shoulders, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in organic cotton with an elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the front and side pockets.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wrapover A-line skirt in a sturdy, brushed wool blend with a low waist, concealed press-studs and fringes down the front and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening on the inside. Unlined.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Short necklace made of metal links decorated with sparkly stones. Toggle clasp. Adjustable length 42-44.5 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short, smocked sleeves with a flounce trim, and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Sleeveless jersey jumpsuit with a deep neckline at the back, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Tights in recycled polyester with an elasticated waist and extra space for a growing tummy. 200 denier.

Short blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, seam under the bust and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck and ties at the hem.
Glittery Alice band with a crown on top decorated with shimmering tulle and faceted plastic beads.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable belt with metal D-rings at the waist. Unlined.
Cold shoulder playsuit in patterned jersey with narrow shoulder straps and flounces that go round the arms. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
